title: Garlic Shrimp Scampi
description: A classic and flavorful seafood dish.
steps: Add garlic and red pepper flakes and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side
Remove shrimp from skillet and set aside.
Pour white wine into the skillet and bring to a simmer.
until the wine has reduced by about half.
Stir in parsley and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Return the shrimp to the skillet and toss to combine.
